entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Summerside
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023
